All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminView
Viewing interface for the hotel administrator
Database
Database class to read and write serialized data into .dat files.
DatabaseView
Class to update Database
FileType
An Enum that corresponds to the different file types that the database will read from and write to.
Gender
An Enum that corresponds to the different genders of the guest.
Guest
The Class that handles Guest model
GuestManager
GuestManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - AdminView and GuestView and the model class - Guest.
GuestView
The Class that shows the view of Guest.
HandleCheckInOutView
The Class checks in and checks out a reservation.
Helper
Helper class to provide support functions for other classes
HotelApp
The starting point of the application.
Identity
The Class for identity details of the guest
IdentityType
An Enum that corresponds to the different type of identities of the guest.
Invoice
A class that handles invoice model.
MainView
 
ManagePaymentView
 
MenuItem
MenuItem represents the menu item in the customisable menu.
Order
Order represents the room servce order made either by the customer/hotel personnel.
OrderStatus
An Enum that corresponds to the different type of order status of the order.
OrderView
The order viewing system for the customer
OutOfRange
Thrown by a Scanner to indicate that the token retrieved is not within the specified range.
PaymentManager
PaymentManager is a controller class that generates Invoice and handles payment.
PromotionDetails
The Class that store the rates of the hotel.
PromotionManager
PromotionManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classess - AdminView and ManagePaymentView and the model classes - Invoice and PromotionDetails.
Reservation
The Class that handles Reservation model.
ReservationManager
RservationManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - AdminView and ReservationView and the model classes - Reservation, Guest and Room.
ReservationStatus
An Enum that corresponds to the different type of reservation status of the reservation.
ReservationView
The Class that shows the view of Reservation.
Room
The Class that handles Room model
RoomManager
RoomManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - AdminView and RoomView and the model class - Room.
RoomServiceAdminView
The room service viewing system for the hotel administrator.
RoomServiceManager
RoomServiceManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - AdminView and OrderView and the model classes - MenuItem and Order.
RoomStatus
An Enum that corresponds to the different type of room status of the room.
RoomType
An Enum that corresponds to the different room types.
RoomView
The Class that shows the view of Room.
UserView
